spec.title: CSS Backgrounds and Borders Module Level 4

background-position-x.name: background-position-x
background-position-x.percentages: refer to width of background positioning area minus width of background image
background-position-x.computedValue: A list, each item consisting of: an offset given as a computed <length-percentage> value, plus an origin keyword

background-position-y.name: background-position-y
background-position-y.percentages: refer to height of background positioning area minus height of background image
background-position-y.computedValue: A list, each item consisting of: an offset given as a computed <length-percentage> value, plus an origin keyword

background-position-inline.name: background-position-inline
background-position-inline.initial: not applicable (initial value comes from physical property)
background-position-inline.percentages: refer to inline-size of background positioning area minus inline-size of background image
background-position-inline.computedValue: A list, each item consisting of: an offset given as a computed <length-percentage> value, plus an origin keyword

background-position-block.name: background-position-block
background-position-block.initial: not applicable (initial value comes from physical property)
background-position-block.percentages: refer to size of background positioning area minus size of background image
background-position-block.computedValue: A list, each item consisting of: an offset given as a computed <length-percentage> value, plus an origin keyword

border-radius.name: border-radius
border-radius.appliesTo: all elements, except table element when border-collapse is collapse

corner-shape.name: corner-shape
corner-shape.appliesTo: all elements, except table element when border-collapse is collapse

border-limit.name: border-limit
border-limit.value: all | [ sides | corners ] <length-percentage [0,∞]>? | [ top | right | bottom | left ] <length-percentage [0,∞]>
border-limit.appliesTo: all elements, except table element when border-collapse is collapse

border-clip.name: border-clip
border-clip.percentages: refer to length of border-edge side
border-clip.computedValue: normal, or a list consisting of absolute lengths, or percentages as specified

border-clip-top.name: border-clip-top
border-clip-top.percentages: refer to length of border-edge side
border-clip-top.computedValue: normal, or a list consisting of absolute lengths, or percentages as specified

border-clip-right.name: border-clip-right
border-clip-right.percentages: refer to length of border-edge side
border-clip-right.computedValue: normal, or a list consisting of absolute lengths, or percentages as specified

border-clip-bottom.name: border-clip-bottom
border-clip-bottom.percentages: refer to length of border-edge side
border-clip-bottom.computedValue: normal, or a list consisting of absolute lengths, or percentages as specified

border-clip-left.name: border-clip-left
border-clip-left.percentages: refer to length of border-edge side
border-clip-left.computedValue: normal, or a list consisting of absolute lengths, or percentages as specified

<position>.value: [ [ left | center | right | top | bottom | start | end | <length-percentage> ] | [ left | center | right | x-start | x-end | <length-percentage> ] [ top | center | bottom | y-start | y-end | <length-percentage> ] | [ center | [ left | right | x-start | x-end ] <length-percentage>? ] && [ center | [ top | bottom | y-start | y-end ] <length-percentage>? ] | [ center | [ start | end ] <length-percentage>? ] [ center | [ start | end ] <length-percentage>? ] ]
